content: *this pattern is **free** as a thank you to everyone who was so supportive this week after i opened up on instagram about some trauma i recently went through knitting has helped me get through some very difficult things and i am honored to have so many new friends in this fantastic community * ***scrappy plied two-night strand *** *by corrado lark * **the backstory ** the pattern uses one main dk yarn throughout held double with all sorts of yarn scraps to make a beautifully unique scrappy hat i give notes to help you navigate color choices and attaching the yarn as well as instructions on making a big crazy pom pom and how to attach it **the needs ** -us 8 5 mm 16 circular needle -us 9 5 5 mm 16 circular needle and a magic looping 32 or larger circular needle or double pointed needles for the hat decreases -a large pom pom maker -a darning needle and 6 stitch markers -200 g of yarn color a 100g/225-246yrds of a tonal or semi-solid dk weight yarn i used olann dk and a madtosh dk colors b 100g of mixed fingering/sock or dk weight variegated or speckled yarn scraps at least 2 yards of each color either hold the fingering/sock weight yarn double or use a dk weight yarn for color b i used approximately 16 different yarns -gauge unblocked so no need to block a gauge swatch with smaller needles 14 st and 20 row per 4 of 1x1 ribbing with larger needles 15 st and 24 row per 4 of stockinet -final measurements 12 length x 8 width adult medium
